column4: hmm, hopefully someone can help me here. i am a fedora user but one of my friends online had been raving to me about the goodness of ubuntu so i thought i would give it a try. so far only thing i can find is a 700 meg live cd. isn't there a dvd that has more packages etc with it? or do i need to install them using apt?
you dont need the dvd.. there IS a dvd.. but dont mess with it.
at this time everything has had so many updates.. its proberly better to stick with the cd and isntall what you need from the net.
aah okay. i'll just use the live cd then. figure i would check out ubuntu. been a die hard RH man since RH5 but haven't really LOOKED at any other distros in 5+ years
